body.name: Tru-Spec Security Friendly Tactical Belt
features: Tough Construction: This men's tactical belt is constructed from a pliable, durable, fade and rip-resistant webbing nylon providing lightweight comfort
Men's Adjustable Belt: Elastic material keeps the end of this mission belt secure, and the 1 3/4-inch wide strap is designed to fit through most belt loops
Efficient Design: This military belt for men features a hidden pocket and a non-metallic buckle for quick and easy clearance at security checkpoints

Multi-Purpose Nylon Belt: These non-metal belts for men are travel-friendly and strong enough for a tactical mission or for fishing, hunting, hiking, camping, water sports; Our men's nylon belt is also suitable for daily wear with all pants

Trusted Apparel and Equipment: One of the leading suppliers of uniforms and personal equipment to military, law enforcement and public safety markets, Tru-Spec offers solid and reliable products that work hard, feel comfortable, and look great
body.description: TRU-SPEC is one of the leading suppliers of uniforms and personal equipment to military, law enforcement and public safety markets. Thousands of police, firefighters, EMTs and military personnel use and depend on our products daily. The name TRU-SPEC has become synonymous with quality, innovation and service. Gunnery Sgt. R. Lee Ermey, USMC (Ret.) known as "The Gunny" has become the official celebrity spokesperson for TRU-SPEC's line of tactically inspired apparel. Tru-Spec Security Friendly Tactical Belt is a classic-looking, yet versatile belt with a non-metallic buckle for quick and easy clearance at security checkpoints. It is made of durable, pliable webbing that fits most belt loops and is comfortable enough to wear every day. Features a hidden pocket to secure your accessories when on a tactical mission.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About TRU-SPEC Since 1950, ATLANCO has been one of the leading suppliers of personal equipment, material and uniforms to the military, law enforcement and public safety markets. ATLANCO continues to grow as a dynamic, pioneering market leader in the design and production of a wide variety of quality manufactured goods. The TRU-SPEC Series Collection features a line of men’s and women’s accessories built for comfort, both on-duty and off-duty. The products highlight technical features and fabrics that enhance the efficiency of movements while allowing a casual yet professional look for any environment. Main Features: Versatile and durable construction Adjustable buckles 2-ply construction

TRU-SPEC Belts Performance and Comfort Complete your uniform with these sturdy belts made with rigid two-ply, durable, fade and rip-resistant material that fits most of the belt loops. Efficient Design Features a non-metallic buckle for quick and easy clearance at security checkpoints; High strength anodized aluminum buckle is non-corrosive, scratch resistant. Multi-purpose Accessory These classical belts provide the perfect complement to any of our TRU-SPEC line of apparel.

Xtreme Belt System Security Friendly Belts 24-7 Series Range Belts Velocity QR Belts Material 100% Nylon 100% Nylon Webbing 100% Nylon Webbing 100% Nylon Webbing Buckle Material Aluminum Non-metallic Aluminium Aluminum Hidden Pocket - ✓ - - Elastic Strap - ✓ - ✓ Custom Fit ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fit me perfectly and is very sturdy. It was exactly what I needed for work. It holds my radio, key holder and my badge. It never comes loose and is quite comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, excellent price.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this belt is light weight, built solid, will last many years. Excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good quality belt for the low price
reviews.reviewText: bought this for my husband whose 300+lbs and is allergic to the metal materials used in belt buckles. He used to get rashes and break out from metal belt buckles and hasn't since using this belt. he's been using it for over a month now and it is kind of hard to use at first because its stiff but it works well for the most part. he states that it does not stay tight around his waist for too long before he has to tighten it again do to there being no belt loop holes. but he states that he likes this belt way more than his previous belts with belt loops. its also easier to use the restroom with this belt. The only reason i didn't give this 5 stars is because it doesn't stay tight before having to retighten it or readjust after too long of wearing it. i bought a size 2X for him and he wears a size 42-44 in jeans. fits good, not a whole lot of room for slack so if you like slack i would go up a size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent belt for every day use
reviews.reviewText: I've been wearing the 5.11 version of this belt for probably 20 years, but recent health issues have caused me to gain enough weight that it's not long enough anymore, and they don't make a longer one.I found the Tru-Spec belt and as soon as I verified the sizing info, I bought it. The nylon at this point is a fair bit stiffer than I remember my 5.11 belt being, however I'm sure with a few washes and a few months of use it'll get nice and supple.Overall, at this point, I am extremely satisfied. I'll try to remember to update this review in a year or so to attest to it's durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rugged. To the point. Effective.
reviews.reviewText: Upon reading reviews, there's a hidden pocket built in, and I have no idea why it exists either. You can fit maybe a couple quarters, but that's it.Anyways, on to the product itself, there's not much to say, and for good reason. The width of the belt's neck is fairly bulky compared to some other nylon belts I have, but quite frankly it still fits, and does so very snugly. This helps it bear a load of weight with increased efficiency, I've come to realize, but it is not particularly comfortable if sitting down or needing mobility for long periods of time. However, that's not the point of this belt.In terms of function, it has no moving parts, which is perfect, and it's fast to put on, adjust, and it doesn't come loose. If you want this belt for rugged purposes, it does the job. Period. This isn't hard to come by in nylon belts, but the one I got in coyote brown looks bronze, given nylon's luster, and is quite good looking, too. Not the best looking nylon belt I've seen, but better than some.For serious use, I don't know what else you could possibly want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Belt is too short....the instructions are wrong ,belt sizes is by inches no S.M.L.
reviews.reviewText: I would like a bigger size MI bought a S which is too short..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, Sturdy, perfect
reviews.reviewText: I wear this everyday. Easily adjustable for concealed carry. Also hold up well on job sites when I’m clipping my measuring tape on and off. 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great work belt
reviews.reviewText: Needed a quick replacement for my 511 belt that I have had for years and finally became a hassle to fix. These are not 511 quality however they are doing the job they were created for and I like it. Price was great. Longevity is still to be determined. I had to get one size up, so not sure about accuracy of sizing chart.
Adquirí este cinturón hace años y aún está como nuevo.Sintético, con hebilla de plástico y un microbolsillo en la etiqueta interior. Se ajusta bien, es durable y no pierde color.
Perfect fit on my 32 wasitI ordered medium

reviews.reviewTitle: Got a smile from CATSA agent.
reviews.reviewText: This belt came with me yo London where attractions often require you to walk through metal detectors. Went through fine without ever having to take it off. At Vancouver International Airport when going through security an agent noticed my belt and asked if I wanted to remove it. I told her it was plastic, she then smiled and waved me through.
It’s a belt. It’s a good belt. Held up my pants as I anticipated. Wasn’t disappointed at all. No butt crack exposed as per my friends and family.
